title: mol_characterization
description: The structure information derived from computation for a molecule entry in database

relaxation_groundState_cation1.description: Relaxation energy of the +1 cation from the ground state geometry to the +1 cation geometry

relaxation_cation1_groundState.description: Relaxation energy of the ground state from the +1 cation geometry to the ground state geometry

relaxation_groundState_anion1.description: Relaxation energy of the -1 anion from the ground state geometry to the -1 anion geometry

relaxation_anion1_groundState.description: Relaxation energy of the ground state from the -1 anion geometry to the ground state geometry

vertical_ionization_energy.description: Vertical ionization energy of the molecule

vertical_ionization_energy_2.description: Second vertical ionization energy of the molecule

vertical_electron_affinity.description: Vertical electron affinity energy of the molecule

vertical_electron_affinity_2.description: Second vertical electron affinity energy of the molecule

adiabatic_ionization_energy.description: Adiabatic ionization energy of the molecule

adiabatic_ionization_energy_2.description: Second adiabatic ionization energy of the molecule

adiabatic_electron_affinity.description: Adiabatic electron affinity energy of the molecule

adiabatic_electron_affinity_2.description: Second adiabatic electron affinity energy of the molecule

rmsd_groundState_cation1.description: The root mean square difference (RMSD) between the ground state and cation 1 geometries, Kabsch algorithm

rmsd_cation1_cation2.description: The root mean square difference (RMSD) between the cation 1 and cation 2 geometries, Kabsch algorithm

rmsd_groundState_anion1.description: The root mean square difference (RMSD) between the ground state and anion 1 geometries, Kabsch algorithm

rmsd_anion1_anion2.description: The root mean square difference (RMSD) between the anion 1 and anion 2 geometries, Kabsch algorithm

hole_reorganization_energy.description: Reorganization energy of cation hole for the molecule

electron_reorganization_energy.description: Reorganization energy of anion electron for the molecule

omega.description: Tuned omega parameter for long ranged corrected functional
